name: Philosopher's Stone
description:
In this game, players will experience the life of alchemists from apprentices to Masters in miniature. Specifically, players perform alchemy by collecting specific card combinations and playing them. The ultimate goal is the ultimate achievement of alchemy - the Sorcerer's stone.

This game is for 2022 Epic Megajam, from the team: DBG without deck-building.
